attributes.action: Help people get loose skin removal after weight loss on the nhs.
attributes.additional_details: I have lost 10 stone and wanted help getting surgery just to be told i aint lost enough im sorry thats a joke, i am not one of these that sit around and do nothing then want a gastric band fitted i have done hard work so i think they should help us out.
attributes.background: I want them to help people like me that have done all the hard work to lose weight and get heathy, give is the surgery to help out with our mental health problems.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a clinical decision for the NHS.
